**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _guardian staff_ is formed from ivory strands woven in a diamond pattern and capped with a glowing ruby. Those charged with protecting others value this staff's spells. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Guardian Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 1.1 **Price** 250 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_forbidding ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=126)
  • **1st** [_sanctuary_](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [_spirit link_](/Spells.aspx?ID=302)
  • **2nd** [_shield other_](/Spells.aspx?ID=281), _spirit link_
Guardian Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 1.1 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_life connection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=939), _spirit link_
  • **4th** [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), _spirit link_
Guardian Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 1.1 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_blessing of defiance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=871), [_death ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=64), _spirit link_
  • **6th** _freedom of movement_, [_repulsion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=254), [_scintillating safeguard_](/Spells.aspx?ID=713), _spirit link_
name: Guardian Staff (Greater)
